title: Chrome not working on Jax
body: My Chrome skin isn't working on my Jax. I have played several games and selected my Chrome skin for Jax win the game starts up he is in his basic form. Help!!!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

When you're looking to use your chroma pack, do you have Nemesis Jax selected? If not, select that skin in champion select, and then click on one of the colored boxes to change the chromas.  (I've attached a screenshot of what I'm referring to.)

 If you have any additional questions, please feel free to reach out!
